items.headline: My husband sold his IRA without my knowledge prior to our divorce. Is this legal?

items.headline: ‘I’m scared for her’: My wife, 48, is financially illiterate. I’m 67. What happens when I die?

items.headline: Nebius prices stock-market offering at 44% premium to before it announced Microsoft deal
items.summary_en: Nebius on Thursday priced a stock-market offering at a 44% premium to where it stood before inking a massive cloud deal with Microsoft, a demonstration of how quickly the market can re-price earnings expectations in the AI age.
